title: Ep. 951 - The Climate Change Assault Continues On Ukraine
description:
John Kerry hopes Putin’s invasion of Ukraine doesn’t distract the world from the Sun Monster, the White House admits its sanctions won’t do anything, and the U.S. immigrant population hits a record high.
